name: QuickAssistESL
tagline: App providing assistance with autonomous reading for ESL / EFL learners
body:
###QuickAssist ESL

This project uses nodejs and the Python NLTK to provide a web app that assists learners of English with the autonomous reading of self-selected English texts by making a number of interfaces to NLP resources available to them.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
